## 🏷️ Type of Change

Please mark the relevant option:

- [ ] 🐛 **Bug fix** (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] ✨ **New feature** (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] 💥 **Breaking change** (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] 📖 **Documentation** (documentation only changes)
- [ ] 🎨 **Code style** (formatting, missing semi colons, etc; no production code change)
- [ ] ♻️ **Refactoring** (refactoring production code, eg. renaming a variable)
- [ ] 🔧 **Chore** (updating grunt tasks etc; no production code change)
- [ ] 🧪 **Tests** (adding missing tests, refactoring tests; no production code change)
- [ ] 🛡️ **Security** (security improvements or vulnerability fixes)
